allow:
Bash(find src/app/api -name "*.ts" -type f -exec sh -c '\
  if grep -q ""console\.log"" ""$1""; then \
    if ! grep -q ""import { debug }"" ""$1""; then \
      echo ""import { debug } from \""@/lib/utils/debug\"";"" > /tmp/newfile && cat ""$1"" >> /tmp/newfile && mv /tmp/newfile ""$1""; \
    fi; \
    sed -i """" ""s/console\.log(/debug.log(/g"" ""$1""; \
    echo ""Updated: $1""; \
  fi \
' _ {} ;)
